library(infographiq)

<base target="_parent">


```{r out.width='100%'}
tryCatch(
    plot_dygraph_timeseries(
        csv_tv  = "https://github.com/mhepner90/LUMCON_ODOTCOMM18/blob/master/prep/data/drums_nmfs.csv",
        title   = "Commercial Red and Black Drum Landings",
        y_label = "Pounds",
        col_t   = "Year",
        col_y   = "Pounds"
        #skip_lines
        , group_by="Species"
        #std_err   
        #filter
    ),
    error = function(e) e
)
```
